title: The vvonder of vvomen or The tragedie of Sophonisba as it hath beene sundry times acted at the Blacke Friers. Written by Iohn Marston.
author: Marston, John, 1575?-1634.
publisher: Printed by Iohn Windet and are to be sold [by W. Cotton] neere Ludgate,
